Content:: Koen Bouwman (born 2 December 1993 in Ulft) is a Dutch cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam Team Jumbo–Visma.[3] He was named in the startlist for the 2016 Vuelta a Espa√±a.[4] In May 2018, he was named in the startlist for the 2018 Giro d'Italia.[5]
